workExperiences.title: Sr. Software Engineer
workExperiences.challenges:
Liberty Mutual is a large company with various departments, and each department or project has implemented its own business logic and technology stack. In one project, you might find a React implementation, while another could use Angular. You could also come across Vue.js or even plain Vanilla JavaScript.

Over time, the look and feel (the UI implementation) have evolved, leading to inconsistencies. The challenge is that Liberty Mutual’s brand identity, including its UI, has also evolved and changed over time, creating further discrepancies.
workExperiences.solutions: Liberty Mutual needed a solution to manage all its brand identity in one centralized place. To achieve this, they created an in-house UI library to be used company-wide. This library was built using web component technology, which is agnostic and native, allowing it to be supported across any framework or technology, such as React, Angular, Vue, or plain JavaScript.
workExperiences.contributions: As a Senior Software Engineer, I designed and built several web components for this UI library. One of the components I’m most proud of is the stepper component, which has become one of the most widely used across projects.

workExperiences.title: Sr. Frontend Developer
workExperiences.challenges:
Build a new Avaya design system. Initially, this project began as a CSS file with custom styles, which was widely adopted across company projects. However, this solution proved impractical because it lacked HTML implementation. For example, a major challenge was creating HTML that adhered to the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) set by the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C). These guidelines outline best practices for color contrast, heading structures, clear link text, and the proper use of ARIA attributes to enhance screen reader functionality.

Without a structured approach, developers struggled to implement and test these accessibility requirements in their projects. This not only increased development time but also diverted focus away from working on core business logic.
workExperiences.solutions: Developed a React-based UI component library that incorporates accessibility standards (A11Y). This approach enables developers to speed up the development process while ensuring compliance with accessibility guidelines.
workExperiences.contributions: As a Senior Software Engineer, I designed and built several components for this UI library.

workExperiences.title: Sr. Software Engineer
workExperiences.description: Implemented responsive design standards, creating web applications that are optimized for various devices and screen sizes, to enhance the user experience. Actively contributed to the development process by implementing new features and functionalities, enhancing the overall capabilities of the web applications.

workExperiences.title: Sr. Software Engineer
workExperiences.description: Actively contributed to the development process by implementing new features and functionalities, improving the capabilities and usability of the web application. Successfully integrated an Electron application into the web platform, allowing users to download, save, and upload Word documents with ease, streamlining document management and collaboration.

workExperiences.title: Sr. Frontend Developer
workExperiences.description: Played a key role in the enhancement of the marketplace and e-commerce website by developing and implementing new features, improving the user experience, and ensuring the platform's competitiveness in the market. Demonstrated a problem-solving mindset by actively participating in the resolution of live issues, ensuring the uninterrupted and smooth operation of the e-commerce website. Successfully integrated a payment system into the website, streamlining the checkout process and enhancing payment security, contributing to an improved user experience and increased conversions. Responsibly updated the website to accommodate new marketing campaigns, aligning it with the latest strategies and ensuring that the platform effectively promoted products and engaged customers.

workExperiences.title: Sr. Frontend Developer
workExperiences.description: Played a significant role in the enhancement and optimization of the Internal Admin tool to manage the customer's information and billing, focusing on improving its functionality and performance. Conducted a comprehensive code refactor, transitioning the project from jQuery to React with TypeScript, modernizing the codebase, and ensuring a more efficient and maintainable application.

educations.degree: Associate Degree in Information Systems Management, specializing in Computer Programming
